abstract: United Nations announce internal inquiry has cleared Anders Kompass, official who initially leaked information to French government about investigation of accusations that French soldiers on UN peacekeeping mission had sexually abused children in Central African Republic.

headline.print_headline: United Nations; Official Cleared in Leak Inquiry
headline.main: U.N. Official Cleared in Leak Inquiry

snippet: Anders Kompass leaked information to the French government in 2014 about accusations that French soldiers in the Central African Republic had sexually abused children.
lead_paragraph: Anders Kompass leaked information to the French government in 2014 about accusations that French soldiers in the Central African Republic had sexually abused children.
